API Documentation¶

This page contains some basic documentation about the public API of Sropulpof.

The api Module¶

Public API of Sropulpof

class ControllerApi(notify)¶

This class is part of the Core instance and get access to the core after its _start method is call.

get_contacts(caller)¶

Get the list of all the contacts.

Return type:

a tuple of 2 items:

  • a dictionnary of Contact instances
  • the name of the selected Contact
